strudel_tracks.code:
// Dynamic Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:03:58.104785
// Chain: ethereum
// Activity: 75.8
// Volatility: 65.2

setcps(1.62)

stack(
  // RHYTHMIC LAYER
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.89),
    s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.61),
    s("hh*2").gain(0.59)
  ).bank('RolandTR909'),
  
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<60 62 63 65>")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_lead_2_sawtooth")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.9)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(saw.range(100, 5000).slow(4)).room(1.0).size(0.4),
  
  // BASS LINE
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .gain(0.62)
  .lpf(558)
  .room(1.0),
  
  // HARMONIC PAD
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_synth_strings_2")
  .gain(0.27)
  .room(1.3)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.3)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.12)  // Much less delay
  .size(0.4).chorus(4).delay(0.07)
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(1.6)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Dynamic Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:03:58.104900
// Chain: optimism
// Activity: 82.4
// Volatility: 58.9

setcps(1.88)

stack(
  // RHYTHMIC LAYER
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.83),
    s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.61),
    s("hh*2").gain(0.55)
  ).bank('RolandTR909'),
  
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 75 77>")
  .scale("B:dorian")
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.6)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(saw.range(100, 5000).slow(5)).room(1.6).size(0.4),
  
  // BASS LINE
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:dorian")
  .s("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .gain(0.35)
  .lpf(479)
  .room(1.6),
  
  // HARMONIC PAD
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:dorian")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_3_polysynth")
  .gain(0.43)
  .room(1.4)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.3)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.15)  // Much less delay
  .size(0.4).phaser(6).delay(0.12)
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(1.5)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Dynamic Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:03:58.104972
// Chain: polygon
// Activity: 88.7
// Volatility: 70.5

setcps(2.20)

stack(
  // RHYTHMIC LAYER
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.80),
    s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.54),
    s("hh*2").gain(0.22)
  ).bank('RolandTR909'),
  
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 76 77>")
  .scale("B:mixolydian")
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .clip(rand.range(0.2, 0.8).slow(3))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.4)
  .lpf(cosine.range(250, 14000).slow(4))
  .lpf(sine.range(200, 20000).slow(8)).room(0.5).size(0.5),
  
  // BASS LINE
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:mixolydian")
  .s("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .gain(0.37)
  .lpf(740)
  .room(0.5),
  
  // HARMONIC PAD
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:mixolydian")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_3_polysynth")
  .gain(0.41)
  .room(1.0)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.2)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.07)  // Much less delay
  .size(0.5).phaser(3).delay(0.12)
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(2.7)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Dynamic Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:03:58.105028
// Chain: base
// Activity: 78.1
// Volatility: 62.3

setcps(1.73)

stack(
  // RHYTHMIC LAYER
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.87),
    s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.42),
    s("hh*2").gain(0.20)
  ).bank('RolandTR909'),
  
  // LEAD MELODY
  n("<72 74 75 77>")
  .scale("B:dorian")
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.1)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .hpf(saw.range(100, 5000).slow(3)).room(0.7).size(0.6),
  
  // BASS LINE
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:dorian")
  .s("gm_electric_bass_finger")
  .gain(0.48)
  .lpf(608)
  .room(0.7),
  
  // HARMONIC PAD
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:dorian")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_2_warm")
  .gain(0.43)
  .room(0.7)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.3)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.13)  // Much less delay
  .size(0.6).flanger(6).delay(0.06)
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(1.8)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Multi-Chain Dynamic Track
// Chains: ethereum, optimism, polygon, base
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:03:58.105135

setcps(1.86)

stack(

  // ethereum chain
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.55),
    n("<60 62 63 65>")
    .scale("B:minor")
    .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
    .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
    .gain(0.37)
    .room(1.3)
  )
  // optimism chain
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.67),
    n("<72 74 75 77>")
    .scale("B:dorian")
    .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
    .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
    .gain(0.48)
    .room(1.2)
  )
  // polygon chain
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.64),
    n("<72 74 76 77>")
    .scale("B:mixolydian")
    .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
    .clip(rand.range(0.2, 0.8).slow(3))
    .gain(0.63)
    .room(1.3)
  )
  // base chain
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.41),
    n("<72 74 75 77>")
    .scale("B:dorian")
    .s("gm_lead_2_sawtooth")
    .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
    .gain(0.36)
    .room(0.9)
  ),
  
  // Combined harmonic layer
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:mixolydian")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_3_polysynth")
  .gain(0.35)
  .room(3.2)
  .shape(0.5)
  .delay(0.51)
)
.late("[0 .01]*4")
.size(6.5)

// Experimental Blockchain Audio Pattern
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:04:10.050752
// Chain: ethereum
// Pattern Type: experimental

setcps(1.62)

stack(
  // Complex rhythmic foundation
  stack(
    s("bd ~ bd").struct("<[x*<1 2> [~@3 x]] x>"),
    s("~ [rim, sd:<2 3>]").room("<0 .2>"),
    n("[0 <1 3>]*<2!3 4>").s("hh"),
    s("rd:<1!3 2>*2").mask("<0 0 1 1>/16").gain(.5)
  ).bank('RolandTR909')
  .mask("<[0 1] 1 1 1>/16".early(.5)),
  
  // Lead melody with complex modulation
  n("<60 62 63 65>")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.4)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .phaser(8)
  .shape(0.4),
  
  // Bass line with rhythmic variation
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .gain(0.60)
  .lpf(229),
  
  // Harmonic pad with texture
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_synth_pad_2_warm")
  .gain(0.44)
  .room(0.9)  // Reduced reverb
  .shape(0.3)  // Less shape
  .delay(0.09)  // Much less delay
  .fm(sine.range(3, 8).slow(8))
  .lpf(sine.range(500, 1000).slow(8)).lpq(5)
  .rarely(ply("2")).chunk(4, fast(2))
  .gain(perlin.range(.6, .9))
  .mask("<0 1 1 0>/16")
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")  // Reduced late effects
.size(2.0)  // Smaller size for less reverb

// Multi-Chain Dynamic Jam Session - Experimental
// Generated: 2025-09-07T06:04:16.929015
// Ethereum: Lead | Optimism: Harmony | Polygon: Percussion | Base: Bass

setcps(1.85)

stack(
  // 🥁 COLLABORATIVE RHYTHM SECTION
  // Each chain contributes unique rhythmic elements
  s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.81).room(0.2),
  s("~ sd ~ sd").gain(0.70).room(0.3),
  s("hh*2").gain(0.40).room(0.1),
  s("bd ~ bd").gain(0.66).room(0.2),
  
  // 🎹 ETHEREUM - Lead Melody (Dynamic interpolation)
  n("<60 62 63 65>")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_lead_6_voice")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .jux(rev)
  .room(1.6)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .gain(0.63)
  .hpf(sine.range(100, 5000).slow(3)).room(1.9).size(0.7),
  
  // 🎼 OPTIMISM - Harmony Layer (Dynamic interpolation)
  n("<72 74 75 77>")
  .scale("B:minor")  // Use shared scale
  .s("gm_lead_3_calliope")
  .clip(perlin.range(0.1, 1.0).slow(2))
  .room(0.9)
  .lpf(rand.range(400, 16000).slow(6))
  .gain(0.67)
  .hpf(sine.range(100, 5000).slow(6)).room(0.8),
  
  // 🎸 BASE - Bass Foundation (Dynamic interpolation)
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")  // Use shared scale
  .s("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .gain(0.74)
  .lpf(578)
  .room(0.5)
  .hpf(sine.range(100, 5000).slow(3)).room(0.6),
  
  // 🎛️ POLYGON - Percussion & Texture (Dynamic interpolation)
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")  // Use shared scale
  .s("gm_synth_pad_2_warm")
  .gain(0.33)
  .room(0.7)
  .shape(0.4)
  .delay(0.13)
  .lpf(cosine.range(250, 14000).slow(4))
  .lpf(perlin.range(200, 20000).slow(4)).room(0.9),
  
  // 🎼 COLLABORATIVE HARMONIC LAYER
  // All chains contribute to the harmony with dynamic interpolation
  n("0 2 3 5")
  .scale("B:minor")
  .s("gm_synth_strings_2")
  .gain(0.25)
  .room(0.8)
  .shape(0.2)
  .delay(0.05)
  
  // 🎵 INTERACTIVE ELEMENTS - Chains respond to each other
  .mask("<0 1 1 0>/8")  // Ethereum leads
  .mask("<1 0 0 1>/8")  // Optimism responds
  .mask("<0 0 1 1>/8")  // Polygon adds texture
  .mask("<1 1 0 0>/8")  // Base provides foundation
)
.late("[0 .01]*2")
.size(3.7)
